Configuring UCS Manager

This chapter details on how to configure the UCS Manager arefer to the image below:

Figure 8-1 Configure UCS Manager

To configure the UCS Manager, perform the following:

 1. Enter the IP Address of UCS in the text box.

 2. Enter the Username and Password.

 3. Click Ping to test the server.

 4. You will get one of these message, click OK

Ping Success

Ping Failure

 

 

 

 

 5. Click Push Configuration to configure the UCS Server.

 6. You will get any one of the below three messages. Click OK

Figure 8-2 Push Failed

Figure 8-3 Push Success and XML Failed

Figure 8-4 Push Success XML Success

 7. Click Download to download the UCS configuration details. Click UCS ADA Config Utility to download the Config Utility file.

 8. Click Finish to complete the configuration process.
